Add unit tests

Related to #446

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this have a version that takes a long?
We typically do all argument validation in the constructor. So any errors are deferred until build() is called.
May be duplicated elsewhere if I'm not mistaken. Think about extracting into a shared utils class.
ListVersionsPage to be consistent with the naming convention used in other APIs.
Probably belongs in the shared util. I assume there are other places where this is needed.
